description: Manage report within a given VM configuration profile assignment.

commands.name: az automanage configuration-profile-assignment vm report list
commands.summary: List reports within a given VM configuration profile assignment.
commands.syntax:
az automanage configuration-profile-assignment vm report list --assignment-name
                                                              --resource-group
                                                              --vm-name
examples: az automanage configuration-profile-assignment vm report list --assignment-name default -g {rg} --vm-name {vm_name}

commands.name: az automanage configuration-profile-assignment vm report show
commands.summary: Get information about a report associated with a VM configuration profile assignment run.
commands.syntax:
az automanage configuration-profile-assignment vm report show [--assignment-name]
                                                              [--ids]
                                                              [--name]
                                                              [--resource-group]
                                                              [--subscription]
                                                              [--vm-name]
examples: az automanage configuration-profile-assignment vm report show -n {report_name} --assignment-name default -g {rg} --vm-name {vm_name}
